extension_description.message: This extension allows to quickly open links in a new tab

options_description.message: Provide titles and base urls for your shortcuts

not_configured_description.message: Press below button to go to options and set up base urls.

help_title_explanation.message: Title text to be displayed in popup as a label for text input field.

help_url_explanation.message: An url to be modified/appended and opened in a new tab. In can be defined in a following ways:

help_url_explanation_1.message: no placeholder - your input will be appended at the end of the url

help_url_explanation_2.message: with placeholder - placeholder ' % ' will be replaced with your input

multientry_checkbox.message: Allow entering multiple space-separated values to open multiple tabs using the same base url.
